meta.name: Delete Document
meta.description: Deletes a document from a specified collection in MongoDB by document ID and returns the operation response.

meta.name: Fetch Document
meta.description: Fetches and returns the entire document data from a MongoDB collection based on the given document ID.

meta.name: Full Text Search
meta.description:
This performs a full-text search in a specified MongoDB collection,  conducts the search, returns matched documents.

To enable full-text search (FTS) in MongoDB, follow this [guide](https://docs.buildship.com/tutorials/mongodb-search#full-text-search) on setting up MongoDB Search Index.

meta.name: Hybrid Search
meta.description:
This performs a hybrid search in a specified MongoDB collection,  conducts the search, returns matched documents.

To enable semantic search in MongoDB, follow this [guide](https://docs.buildship.com/tutorials/mongodb-search#hybrid-search) on setting up search indexes.

meta.name: Insert Document
meta.description: Inserts the given data into a MongoDB collection and returns the ids of the inserted documents.

meta.name: Query Collection
meta.description: Queries for multiple documents in a MongoDB collection using connection string, database name, collection name, query, sort, and projection.

meta.name: Semantic Search
meta.description:
This performs a semantic search in a specified MongoDB collection,  conducts the search, returns matched documents.

To enable semantic search in MongoDB, follow this [guide](https://docs.buildship.com/tutorials/mongodb-search#semantic-search) on setting up vector search index.

meta.name: Update Document
meta.description: Updates a specific document in a MongoDB collection using the updateOne function and returns the operation result.
